channel.title: Staff on 562?
channel.description: hi... i am moving on to 562 since i think 317's are just to easy to code and now i can't find where to change myself to admin/owner :| can anyone tell me quick on howto? :confused: :confused: ;D ;D ;D :D :)

item.title: Staff on 562?
item.dc:creator: @chaos_666 chaos 666
item.description:
@chaos_666 wrote:

[quote=“whattehp406, post:5, topic:362025”][quote author=kneistol link=topic=458302.msg3353747#msg3353747 date=1285592455]

open up windows search and select to search your 562 source…search for characters or player rights… it should direct you to the correct files…hope that helped …tyco

im using ubuntu

If you cannot even make yourself owner then you do not have the ability to code a 562.

As said above im using ubuntu… and second… remember when you were new? when everybody said the same to you as you say to me?
well… i will ask you one thing… how did you learn to code without asking a single question?
[/quote]

i did, with tut’s :D[/quote]

Most people that mess with private servers can’t “code” all they do is script. Also if 317’s are too easy go apply with jagex. Not kidding.

Read full topic

item.title: Staff on 562?
item.dc:creator: @_BOOM .:BOOM:.
item.description:
@_BOOM wrote:

Data>Savedgames then find your username and then open the file with WORDPAD(notepad shows really messy) and do Ctrl+F and type “Right” and then it will something like <right>0<right> (something like that, i forgot what it really looks like…) change the 0 to a 3. Owners usually dont have crowns so do a 2

Read full topic

item.title: Staff on 562?

item.description:
@_tyco wrote:

lol ok silly of me to assume no idea about ubunto…
